Reviews.Title: “Reasonable place to stay, nothing special”
Reviews.Author: Simon0362
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 days business trip found pleasant functional special size city hotel clean decor especially bathroom bit dated impression renovated 20 ago clean functioned breakfast ok little dull lots breads meats cereal else coffee staff front desk helpful proactive walking road outside hotel towards city loads bars restaurants tapas mile

Reviews.Title: “Point of Departure”
Reviews.Author: rqbii
Reviews.Content: gran atlanta choice access metro barajas airport madrid city center located business upper middle class neighborhood hotel special walls thin exposing guests conversations neighbors hallway chatter breakfast acceptable found breakfast host abrupt somewhat obtrusive cloth napkins provided smelled absolutely revolting appeared clean pressed odor combined dark green color convinced touch purpose napkins provided stopover airport escape hustle bustle historic district gran atlanta choice particularly relies public transportation

Reviews.Title: “Good”
Reviews.Author: carlosochoa
Reviews.Content: hotel close station nuevos ministerios allows access directly airport reach center madrid 20 minutes taking account walking inside station street carries traffic staff polite helpful job efficiently despite hotel updating feel 3star hotel 2 entering 80s 70s mistake single bedding dusty insulation contrary windows left air enter breakfast abundant strictly 730am business visitors ride metro outskirts madrid start 7am wifi entire hotel adequately tv poor choice channels safe type coin key

Reviews.Title: “Repeated guest - shall stay again”
Reviews.Author: Raissa H
Reviews.Content: ive 5night visit madrid stayed hotel previous occasions reassuring familiar smiling reception desk staff polite friendly helpful command english am fluent spanish hotel excellent location withing walking distance metro biggest department stores connected bus service historic madrid centre clean serviced daily overall value hotel definitely stay recommend visitors

Reviews.Title: “Good and Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Jules M
Reviews.Content: hotel bit ones share stars expect modern star hotel decoration 70s 80s stayed single person clean decoration hotel located nice neighbourhood metro stations 30 minutes airport downtown madrid 30 minutes

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: amir_said7
Reviews.Content: nice location santiago stadium near commercial towers madrid nice shopping shops zara hm massimo staff helpfull ok ok include minibar ac somehow weak wireless coverage overall hotel average

Reviews.Title: “Fine for short stays”
Reviews.Author: Lipi T
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel night nice location city center madrid visits hotel suffocated feel atleast window hotel wall waiting lounge guest nice overall average rating

Reviews.Title: “Perfect stay in Madrid”
Reviews.Author: Anthony Z
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 5 days till left hotel 2 days ago nice stay hotel reasonable breakfast friendly staff recommend hotel generation thanks hotel gran atlanta wishes anthony

Reviews.Title: “Save your money and book into a hostel!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Joanne R
Reviews.Content: honestly worst hotels stayed love fit 4 star rating 2 stars appropriate smell halls awful beds unbelievably wont mention view window facilities tea coffee tv barely hear guests adjacent talking flushing toilets breakfast joke ridiculously overpriced offer staff barely understand word english luckily arrived 6 oclock evening left 7 am following morning save money sleep park bench instead

Reviews.Title: “Gran Atlanta - a bad experience”
Reviews.Author: sparklesKent_UK
Reviews.Content: hotel located noisy reasons listed merit 4 stars advertises breakfast priced facilities available night example arrived late fresh milk hotel worst hotel communicate properly advance stay reply email sent days visit changing double single type colleague occupied 50 euro night charged 120 euro night double occupancy single occupied double cancelled twin bed reducing cleaning costs increased costs hotel dishonest disrespectful money recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good value, good location but basic accommodation”
Reviews.Author: yano23
Reviews.Content: hotel booked selected cheap close madrid palacio de congres conference centre close santiago bernabeu football stadium located quiet leafy street nice neighbourhood 2 miles north centre madrid read tripadvisor reviews beforehand expected worst wasnt bad undoubtedly pay arrive expecting 34 star accommodation disappointed basic clean cheap stay happy decor pretty odd dated feels 1975 pretty view internal courtyard hard basic bed slept ok wasnt ideal didnt spend lot time trust wont air con summer relief 30 degrees outside staff friendly breakfast plenty options didnt bother pay wifi slow provided external company positives negatives wouldnt ok base days madrid business realistic whatever 4 star hotel decent basic clean price match

Reviews.Title: “Overnighters only. Not a holiday hotel. But kitsch and conveniently located.”
Reviews.Author: GRW007
Reviews.Content: wow start basically acceptable hotel short stays business travel dont mind facilities dated bit cramped hotel looks decorated hasnt changed bit example ashtrays lifts despite smoking sign brown panelling faded pictures companys hotels plastered lobby flags outside lobby seen days actually fond kitsch look days look government building banana republic dont thats owners necessities wouldnt consider real fourstar hotel breakfast okay clean safe wouldnt spend time views unless looking roofing panels stairwells conveniently located cheap madrid night positives cheap location near conference centre metro stops quiet street accessible clean decent breakfast friendly staff limited language skills negatives beds noisy ac efficient cramped wifi 1973 chandeliers brown wood panelling arent vogue ideal romantic getaway unless gene hunt andor wear brown leather jacket

Reviews.Title: “This is not a four star hotel by any stretch of the imagination”
Reviews.Author: grotpaws
Reviews.Content: cramped horrible smell wardrobes bedspread matter window smell air conditioning smell worse staff friendly helpful breakfast ws average hotel suitable 2 star location beds extremely uncomfortable

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel poor breakfast.”
Reviews.Author: Fortalezakaj
Reviews.Content: stay price breakfast extremely disappointing hotel ok fancy functional hotel stay watch movie bathrooms ok bathtub enjoying extra feature
